front.title: Herokiller
front.setup: Place Behemoth into play, "Herokiller" side up. Remove all Movement cards from the villain deck, shuffle them, and put them aside as the Movement Deck
front.gameplay:
Whenever Behemoth would deal damage, use Behemoth's current damage type.
At the start of the villain turn, if Behemoth has less than 30 HP, flip Behemoth.
At the start of the villain turn, play the top card of the Movement deck.
At the end of the villain turn, Behemoth deals each hero X damage, where X is the number of proximity tokens on the hero.
front.advanced: If a hero ever has 6 proximity tokens on them, they are immediately incapacitated

back.title: Herokiller, Desperate
back.gameplay:
Whenever Behemoth would deal damage, use Behemoth's current damage type.
At the start of the villain turn, play the top card of the Movement deck.
Whenever Behemoth would be dealt damage of his current damage type, redirect the damage to the hero target with the lowest HP.
At the end of the villain turn, Behemoth deals each hero X damage, where X is the number of proximity tokens on the hero.
At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck
back.advanced: If a hero ever has 6 proximity tokens on them, they are immediately incapacitated

card.name: Advance
card.text: Place a proximity token on every hero

card.name: Leap
card.text: Place 2 proximity tokens on a hero. Place 1 proximity token on the hero before and after that hero in the turn order

card.name: A Shift of Attention
card.text: Remove every proximity token from a hero. Place them all on a different hero

card.name: No Safety
card.text: Move 1 proximity token from every hero to the hero with the least proximity tokens

card.name: Shift
card.text: Move all proximity tokens on each hero to the hero to their right

card.name: Focus
card.text: Place a proximity token on a hero

card.name: Roar
card.text:
Behemoth's damage type is Sonic.
Behemoth deals 2 damage to all non-villain targets.

card.name: Lightning Bolt
card.text:
Behemoth's damage type is Lightning.
Behemoth deals 5 damage to a hero. That hero may move a proximity token to another hero.

card.name: Discharge
card.text:
Behemoth's damage type is Energy.
Behemoth deals 2 damage to each hero target. Each hero may move a proximity token to another hero

card.name: Wildfire
card.text:
Behemoth's damage type is Fire.
Behemoth deals H damage to any hero with 3 or more proximity tokens.

card.name: Unstoppable Advance
card.text:
When this card enters play, change Behemoth's damage type to Melee.
At the end of the villain turn, move a proximity token to the hero with the most proximity tokens

card.name: Juggernaut
card.text:
When this card enters play, change Behemoth's damage type to Sonic.
Reduce damage dealt to Behemoth by 1
Whenever a hero deals damage to Behemoth, move a proximity token to that hero.

card.name: Continuous Crackle
card.text:
When this card enters play, change Behemoth's damage type to Lightning.
Whenever a hero puts an Equipment or Ongoing card into play, Behemoth deals that hero 2 damage.

card.name: Twisted Wreckage
card.text:
Behemoth's damage type is Lightning.
Destroy 2 hero cards and remove them from the game. Move 1 proximity token to a hero who owned one of the destroyed cards

card.name: Earthquake
card.text:
Behemoth's damage type is Melee.
Destroy all environment cards
Destroy all ongoing cards
Destroy all equipment cards

card.name: Incinerate
card.text:
Behemoth's damage type is Fire.
Destroy two ongoing cards. Move 1 proximity token from one of the heroes who owned one of the destroyed cards to another hero
